title: 219: Pilot Pete In Paradise + Aliens Invade 2021 + Bachelor Breakups, Bennett, Ben, & More!
itunes:title: 219: Pilot Pete In Paradise + Aliens Invade 2021 + Bachelor Breakups, Bennett, Ben, & More!
description:
Today The Broads attempt to cover some current Bachelor Nation News and wind covering a lot of Bach news but also go on a 30 minute alien invasion tangent…which feels appropriate. The Broads chat ABC’s Bachelor in Paradise news, Pilot Pete, ALIENS + ALIEN THEORY, Dale and Clare’s breakup, Tayshia and Zac news, Bennett’s horrifying social media presence, unwarranted Ben theories and rants, Chris Harrison telling someone to “suck it”, current Rachael updates, and more! 


***Join The Broads for a special bonus episode on Friday!

trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale at Stamps.com click on the Microphone at the TOP of the homepage and type in CHATTY
